internships.title: Professional Experience
internships.description: My journey through various internships and professional experiences in web and software development.

experiences.title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER | SHOWCASE WEBSITE
experiences.description: Creation of a responsive showcase website dedicated to a restaurant. User interface and user experience (UI/UX) design. Integration of animations and clear call-to-action.

experiences.title: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER | WEB APPLICATION
experiences.description: Development of a web application for managing exhibitions, events, and artists. Implementation of an artwork management system. Integration of a database to store information about events and artists. User experience optimization with a responsive Tailwind interface.

experiences.title: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER | WEB APPLICATION
experiences.description: Development of a medical analysis web application using MVC model. Database design and management with CSV files. User interface development with Bootstrap.

experiences.title: WEB DEVELOPER | STOCK MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
experiences.description: Development of MySQL queries in PHP for stock management. Design and implementation of dynamic dashboards with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Optimization of the stock management process.

projectDetails.featuresDescription: Explore the powerful capabilities of this project
projectDetails.demoInProgressDescription: The demo will be available soon

items.title: Toulouse Art Gallery
items.description: Complete web application for managing a modern art gallery. This application allows managing exhibitions, events and artist profiles with an advanced artwork management system.
items.fullDescription: Development of a robust web application for complete art gallery management. The project includes an exhibition management system with event planning, a digital catalog of works with complete metadata, and detailed artist profiles. The responsive interface optimizes the user experience on all devices.

items.title: Restaurant Utopia
items.description: Responsive showcase website dedicated to a restaurant. Modern UI/UX design with animations and call-to-action optimized for user experience.
items.fullDescription: Creation of an elegant showcase website for Restaurant Utopia. The project focuses on exceptional user experience with smooth animations, intuitive navigation and responsive design. The interface presents the menu, restaurant atmosphere and facilitates reservations.

items.title: Swiss Padel Stars
items.description: Development of Swiss Padel Stars website to establish the brand as an essential padel reference in Switzerland. Premium e-commerce site for selling padel ping-pong tables to individuals.
items.fullDescription: Development of a complete e-commerce platform for Swiss Padel Stars, specialized in selling padel ping-pong tables. The project includes a product management system, advanced shopping cart, secure ordering process and administration interface for inventory management.

items.title: Escape The Web
items.description: Interactive game where players must solve puzzles by interacting with a web interface. Each puzzle is validated by unit and E2E tests to guarantee optimal user experience.
items.fullDescription: Development of an innovative interactive web game combining puzzles and programming. Players progress by solving technical challenges while learning web development concepts. The project includes a progression system, level saving and automatic solution validation.

items.title: SuperMarket App
items.description: Mobile application for a supermarket allowing users to browse products, manage their cart and place online orders.
items.fullDescription: Development of a complete mobile application for supermarket with React Native. The application offers a smooth shopping experience with category navigation, advanced search, cart management and ordering system. Mobile-optimized interface with high performance.

items.title: E-commerce Watch Landing Page
items.description: Landing page for an online watch store, optimized for conversion with clean design and clear calls-to-action.
items.fullDescription: Creation of a high-conversion landing page for a premium watch store. The minimalist design highlights products with clear visual hierarchy, customer testimonials and strategically placed call-to-actions to maximize conversions.

items.title: Medical Analysis Management Application
items.description: Complete web application for viewing medical analysis results, entering patient results and generating statistics. Intuitive interface with dedicated patient and doctor spaces.
items.fullDescription: Development of a secure web application for medical analysis management. The system allows patients to view their results and doctors to enter data with automatic report generation. MVC architecture with access rights management and enhanced security.

items.title: SuperMarket App
items.description: Mobile application for a supermarket allowing users to browse products, manage their cart and place online orders.
items.fullDescription: Development of a complete mobile application for supermarket with React Native. The application offers a smooth shopping experience with category navigation, advanced search, cart management and ordering system. Mobile-optimized interface with high performance.

items.title: E-commerce Watch Landing Page
items.description: Landing page for an online watch store, optimized for conversion with clean design and clear calls-to-action.
items.fullDescription: Creation of a high-conversion landing page for a premium watch store. The minimalist design highlights products with clear visual hierarchy, customer testimonials and strategically placed call-to-actions to maximize conversions.

techWatch.title: Tech Watch
techWatch.description: Discover my 6 main sources of technology watch to stay at the forefront of innovation and modern web development

items.title: Using ChatGPT
items.description: The use of ChatGPT has spread across various fields, from education to customer service management. ChatGPT helps automate writing tasks, provides interactive user support and improves process efficiency by providing instant and accurate responses.

items.title: Udemy and YouTube Courses
items.description: Online learning platforms such as Udemy and YouTube are invaluable resources for developers looking to acquire new skills or deepen their knowledge. These platforms offer a wide range of courses and tutorials.

items.title: Developer Groups
items.description: Professional and community social networks like LinkedIn, Reddit, and Stack Overflow are ideal platforms for developers wanting to stay informed about the latest trends and share information.

items.title: Tech Articles & Innovation
items.description: Reading technology articles and blogs is crucial to staying up to date with recent innovations and developments. Sites like TechCrunch, Wired, and Medium offer in-depth analysis and news from the technology industry.

items.title: W3Schools - Programming
items.description: W3Schools is an essential resource for programming beginners. The site offers interactive tutorials and practical exercises on various programming languages and web technologies.

items.title: Cybersecurity Sites
items.description: Cybersecurity is a major concern for developers and businesses. Specialized sites like Krebs on Security, SecurityWeek, and the OWASP blog provide vital information on current threats and security best practices.

additionalItems.title: GitHub & Open Source
additionalItems.description: Exploring open source projects on GitHub to discover new technologies, study quality code and contribute to the community. GitHub Trending allows you to follow emerging technologies and popular libraries in the development ecosystem.

additionalItems.title: Technical Documentation
additionalItems.description: Regular reading of official documentation for frameworks and technologies (React, Vue, Angular, Node.js). Changelogs and release notes help track developments, new features and best practices recommended by technology creators.

additionalItems.title: Coding Challenges & Hackathons
additionalItems.description: Participation in programming challenges on platforms like HackerRank, CodeWars, and LeetCode. Hackathons and development contests allow you to discover new approaches, test recent technologies and improve problem-solving skills.
